intro: Fumaria eckloniana, commonly known as the yellow weed or yellow fumitory, is a flowering plant belonging to the Papaveraceae family. It is characterized by its delicate, branched stems and small, yellowish-orange flowers that bloom in late spring to early summer. The plant typically grows in disturbed soils and can be found in meadows, roadsides, and waste areas. Its leaves are alternate, ovate, and often have a hairy texture. Fumaria eckloniana is known for its rapid growth and ability to thrive in a variety of environmental conditions.
